description: Manage application gateway web application firewall (WAF) policies.

commands.name: az network application-gateway waf-policy create
commands.summary: Create an application gateway WAF policy.
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway waf-policy create --name
                                                 --resource-group
                                                 [--custom-rules]
                                                 [--location]
                                                 [--managed-rules]
                                                 [--policy-settings]
                                                 [--tags]
                                                 [--type {Microsoft_BotManagerRuleSet, Microsoft_DefaultRuleSet, OWASP}]
                                                 [--version {0.1, 1.0, 1.1, 2.1, 2.2.9, 3.0, 3.1, 3.2}]
examples: az network application-gateway waf-policy create --name MyApplicationGatewayWAFPolicy --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network application-gateway waf-policy delete
commands.summary: Delete an application gateway WAF policy.
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway waf-policy delete [--ids]
                                                 [--name]
                                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--subscription]
examples: az network application-gateway waf-policy delete --name MyApplicationGatewayWAFPolicy --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network application-gateway waf-policy show
commands.summary: Get the details of an application gateway WAF policy.
examples: az network application-gateway waf-policy show --name MyApplicationGatewayWAFPolicy --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network application-gateway waf-policy update
commands.summary: Update an application gateway WAF policy.
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway waf-policy update [--add]
                                                 [--custom-rules]
                                                 [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                 [--ids]
                                                 [--managed-rules]
                                                 [--name]
                                                 [--policy-settings]
                                                 [--remove]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--set]
                                                 [--subscription]
                                                 [--tags]
examples: az network application-gateway waf-policy update --add communities='12076:5010' --name MyApplicationGatewayWAFPolicy --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network application-gateway waf-policy wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
